doc.title: 97-Year-Old Nankai is in its Golden Time
doc.snippet: In this beautiful autumn, Nankai University celebrated its 97th birthday on October 17. Nankai witnessed these 97 years and cultivated talents for China. During this period, Nankai experienced both glory and damages. At the time of 97th anniversary, without flashy publicity or ceremony, Nankai people kept a low profile in the celebration of the birthday of their alma mater.
